name: Space Traveler Indie Game
description:
In order to fly from planet to planet, you will need to buy or create fuel for the rocket. The rocket has a carrying capacity, so not all of the load can be taken with you. The rocket can be improved, repaired.

The flight from planet to planet will be in the form of a scroller for a while, the further the planet is, the longer the scroller with obstacles will be.

In the game, you can complete tasks for money. Sell garbage to a junk dealer, collect items from various garbage.

The player's energy drops, so you need to eat. The player feeds on minerals that can be bought or mined.

After collecting the accelerator, the player moves to the next level.
